official_title: A bill to amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for fair hearings on disputed medicare claims by an impartial person other than a carrier.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for hearings on disputed Medicare claims by an impartial person other than the carrier designated by the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer benefits under such title.

titles.title: A bill to amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for fair hearings on disputed medicare claims by an impartial person other than a carrier.
